materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a snowy landscape in Murree, Punjab. In the foreground, there are roofed houses amongst trees on a downhill slope. There is a tall building in the center of the photograph. In the background, there is a snow-covered hill tops in the distance. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Murree, Punjab
subject_terms_1: snow (precipitation) scenery (landscape) winter mountains hill settlements
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Murree (Pakistan) Landscape photography Snow Winter Mountains
